sentences.en: A large number of factories reported sizable increases in output as compared with the previous year.
sentences.cn: 大批工厂都报告说,和前一年相比,产量有很大增长.

sentences.en: But if the order is a sizable one, we'll consider it.
sentences.cn: 不过,如果订货数量大, 我们可以考虑.

sentences.en: Divides form into four sizable panes.
sentences.cn: 将窗体分为四个大小相当的长方块.

sentences.en: For the most part they had converted their small prebends into sizable paunches.
sentences.cn: 他们中的大部分人已靠着小小的俸禄养成了大腹便便者.

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizable piece of land that surrounds it.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了那座房子和房子周围一块相当大的土地。

sentences.en: He brought home the bacon by getting a sizable appropriation for his state.
sentences.cn: 他成功地为他的州争取到一笔相当大的拨款.

sentences.en: It is evident that they suffered a sizable economic loss as a result of the war.
sentences.cn: 显然,他们由于战争遭受到相当大的经济损失.

sentences.en: Jack was hanging on to those shares -- he thought they'd show a sizable gain shortly.
sentences.cn: 杰克留着那些股票不脱售, 他认为那些不久就会给他带来相当大的赚头.

sentences.en: More hymns in the Rig Veda are dedicated to him than any other god sizable amount.
sentences.cn: 在《梨俱吠陀》里,献给他的颂歌比其他任何神的都要多得多.

sentences.en: Recently it makes a sizable dent in this prediction.
sentences.cn: 这一预言最近有了很大进展.

sentences.en: Retreat if you see a sizable AA force coming towards you.
sentences.cn: 如果你看到一定规模的防空力量冲你过来,迅速撤退.

sentences.en: Satisfied was Mr. Doherty with the sizable effect of the new experiment.
sentences.cn: 多尔蒂先生对这项新实验的显著效果感到满意.

sentences.en: Some people are pocketing a sizable amount of taxes to finance their lavish lifestyles.
sentences.cn: 有些人把大笔的税收,浪费在自己的生活上.

sentences.en: There remains a sizable gap between aspiration and accomplishment.
sentences.cn: 愿望与成果之间仍有相当大的差距.

sentences.en: Well that's a sizable chunk of change for boyfriend replacement therapy.
sentences.cn: 好吧,这看起来像是某种为了取代男友的疗法.

words.tran_cn: 相比（size的过去分词）；按大小分类
